original_title: 1,001 Ways to Enjoy the Missionary Position
overview: In the near future, where government regulations are so restrictive our most intimate acts are considered acts of rebellion, Nora tries to break out of a lifetime of strict thought and sexual repression before it's too late.
tagline: Two couples, a government official, and an instruction manual. Do the math.
title: 1,001 Ways to Enjoy the Missionary Position
